name: Dizzy Bee
summary:
Guide Dizzy Bee to help him save his fruit friends by tilting and turning your iPhone or iPod touch. Can you help him collect flowers, avoid baddies, and earn medals by leading your fruit friends to safety? Unique gameplay, a fun art style and clever challenges await you. Explore the sea, challenge levels, dive into a whirlpool, ride a windmill and search for a mystical island that disappears. Challenges are quick, so you can play whenever you have a free minute. Are you ready for an adventure?
40 Levels + 5 bonus levels gives you plenty of bang for your buck!
